About the Company: TT Ltd.is engaged in the manufacturing of combed cotton yarn, carded cotton yarn and knitted fabric cloth.The company is also engaged in the manufacture of undergarments, which were marketed under the brand name TT.The product range of the company includes Man-Vests / Singlet,Brief / Drawers,T-Shirts,Bermuda,etc.Woman-Bra,Panty,Thermal Innerwear,etc.Knitted-Vests,Drawers / Briefs,Baba Suits,Panties / Bloomers,etc..The company also engagged in the business of Yarn, Fabric, Cotton, Wind Power, Agro Commodities, Knitwear & Other Made-up.
